modDesc.author: Courseplay.devTeam
modDesc.changeLog: - support for big islands - multiplayer enabled - support for straw harvest addon - new option for course generation to bypass small islands in fields - added support for sprayer Addon (with the friendly support of David FONTAINE) - added combine convoy option - turn maneuver for headland corners to avoid missing fruit - added option to align to 1st waypoint in mode 2, 4 and 6 - added easy setup for multiple tools on one field work course - support for Plantium Edition(Still Work In Progress) - Bugfixes

description.de: Courseplay ist eine Modifikation für den Landwirtschafts-Simulator 17, die es ermöglicht, verschiedenste Fahrzeuge autonom Kurse abfahren zu lassen, Arbeiten zu erledigen, Mähdrescher abzutanken, Früchte zu Verkaufsstellen zu fahren, einen Bunker oder Anhänger per Schaufel zu füllen, Silo zu verdichten und vieles mehr...
description.en: Courseplay is a modification for Farming Simulator 17. It allows you to have many different vehicles driving around autonomously and automatically, have them do field work, unload combines, drive fruit to selling points, fill a bunker or a trailer with a shovel, level and compact silage and much more...
description.fr: Courseplay est une modification pour Farm Simulator 17, qui permet à divers véhicules de travailler de manière autonome, de décharger les moissonneuses-batteuses, de transporter des fruits aux points de vente, de remplir un bunker ou une remorque par godet, de fermer hermétiquement un silo et bien plus...
description.br: O Courseplay é uma modificação para o Farming Simulator 17. Ele permite que você dirija varios veículos diferentes de forma autônoma e automática, coloque-os no trabalho de campo, descarregar ceifadeiras, carregar frutos para vender nos pontos, preencher um BGA ou uma carreta com uma pá carregadeira, nívelar e compactar silagem e muito mais ...
description.cs: Courseplay je rozšíření pro Farming Simulator 17. Umožňuje vozidlům řídit samostatně a automaticky, provádět polní práce, vyložit kombajn, odvoz plodin a zboží do výkupů, plnit zásobníky a vleky pomocí lopaty, rozhrnování a dusání siláže a mnoho dalšího...
description.cz: Courseplay is a modification for Farming Simulator 17. It allows you to have many different vehicles driving around autonomously and automatically, have them do field work, unload combines, drive fruit to selling points, fill a bunker or a trailer with a shovel, level and compact silage and much more...
description.es: Courseplay is a modification for Farming Simulator 17. It allows you to have many different vehicles driving around autonomously and automatically, have them do field work, unload combines, drive fruit to selling points, fill a bunker or a trailer with a shovel, level and compact silage and much more...
description.it: Courseplay è una modifica per Farming Simulator 17. Permette di avere molti veicoli diversi che guidano autonomamente, svolgono lavori sui campi, scaricano trebbie, trasferiscono i raccolti ai punti di venita, riempono bunker o rimorchi con la benna, livellano e compattano insilato e molto altro...
description.jp: Courseplayは、Farming Simulator 17のMODです。これは多くの車両の自動運転・自動作業を可能にします。彼らはあらゆる作業をこなします、コンバインのアンロード、作物運搬、バンカーやトレーラーのローダー作業、サイレージのレベリングと圧縮、その他いろいろ...
description.hu: A Courseplay - Vezetősegéd egy Farming Simulator 17 kiegészítő amivel a munkagépek önállóan képesek bármilyen feladat ellátására: szántás/vetés/aratás/műtrágyázás, kombájn ürítés, terményszállítás, silófeltöltés, rakodás, szintezés, tömörítés és még sokminden más...
description.nl: Courseplay is een modificatie voor Farming Simulator 17. Het geeft je de mogelijkheid om veel verschillende voertuigen autonoom en automatisch te laten rond rijden, veldwerk uit te voeren, dorsen & hakselen, granen en goederen te verkopen aan verkooppunten, een bunker of trailer met een shovel te vullen, niveleren en aanrijden van kuilvoer en nog veel meer...
description.pl: Courseplay jest modyfikacją do Farming Simulator 17. Pozwala wielu różnym pojazdom poruszać sie autonomicznie i automatycznie, wykonywać prace polowe, rozładowywać kombajny, sprzedawać zapasy magazynowe, napełniać silosy bunkrowe lub przyczepy łychą, wyrównywać i ugniatać sieczkę na kiszonkę i wiele, wiele więcej...
description.pt: Courseplay is a modification for Farming Simulator 17. It allows you to have many different vehicles driving around autonomously and automatically, have them do field work, unload combines, drive fruit to selling points, fill a bunker or a trailer with a shovel, level and compact silage and much more...
description.ru: Courseplay - это мод для Farming Simulator 17. Он позволяет Вам использовать множество различных транспортных средств, работающих самостоятельно и автоматически, для выполнения различных полевых работ, разгрузки комбайнов, перевозки продукции в точки продажи, загрузки бункеров или прицепов лопатой, выравнивение и уплотнение силосных траншей, а также многое-многое другое...
description.sl: Courseplay is a modification for Farming Simulator 17.
